column4: there is something fishy going on.. the app "dd" starts for no reason and takes up 50% of my cpu, if im lucky ill get to kill it before it freezes my pc, there is also "klogd" taking up 40% or so, they both seem to launch at the same time, ive just killed them both and now "gzip" is running 96% cpu :| what the hell is it doing? :S
